modification:
1. Add a more robust pre-filtering mechanism to better identify receipt pages
2. Implement a two-stage receipt verification process
3. Add post-processing to remove empty lists and false positives
4. Improve receipt continuity detection with additional metadata comparison
5. Add confidence scoring for receipt classification
6. Include page content analysis to better distinguish receipt types
7. Implement metadata extraction for receipt verification
8. Add cleansing function to handle edge cases and formatting
9. Use ensemble methods for receipt verification
10. Implement validation step for receipt page grouping
